title: Original natural wood floors, contemporary open floor plan.
description: Lots of natural light, high ceilings, oversized windows, architectural details, original natural wood floors, contemporary open floor plan--. this unit has it all, nicely wrapped up in a cozy package! The cozy residence stuns with its abundance of light flowing through the amazing windows that border the west wall, a feature that defines the space with breadth and design. The kitchen is an attractive, functional eating area with white cabinetry, stainless steel appliances granite counters and bar stools for casual seating. The living room, accented with high ceilings and lovely floors, feels surprisingly spacious, offering a comfortable seating and entertaining space. A dedicated, king-sized bedroom is accessed through the adjoining doorway, also accented with those amazing windows and a nice sized closet. A decorative column is a showcase of the original building and sits in a hallway that defines the entrance. A retro-designed bathroom with handsome black and white floor tiles, a tub/shower combo with a sliding glass door and white vanity with black granite counter sits conveniently off the entryway. Located in the historic district of Old City, 315 Arch is a well maintained, stately structure located across from the Quaker Meeting House and next to the Ben Franklin key sculpture and fountain park. Old City is a vibrant neighborhood, home to cultural and historic institutions, numerous cafes and restaurants, boutiques and design shops. It is a hub of public transportation with easy access within and out of the city. Truly an urban oasis for the ultimate urban lifestyle!

title: For rent, a beautiful 4-bedroom, 2.5-bath
description: For rent, a beautiful 4-bedroom, 2.5-bath Mt. Airy twin home. Full of original detail, hardwood floors, and plenty of storage space, this house is perfect for a young family or really anyone hoping to get more for their money. Downstairs is a beautiful living room with big picture windows, a windowed dining room, and an eat-in kitchen with an original pantry. Off the kitchen is a great deck with space for a table and chairs. Upstairs are 4 bedrooms, one with a classically tiled en-suite bath with a large window. The other bedrooms get great light, have good-sized closets, and can each fit queen sized beds. There is also a shared hall bath with a large tub and huge skylight. The basement is partially finished, with a half-bath and plenty of room for a play space or big comfy couch. There is also separate storage/laundry/studio space in the basement and an attached one-car garage! The yard is fenced in and would be great for a green-thumb who doesn’t want too much upkeep! Mt. Airy is a historic Philadelphia neighborhood with great restaurants and shops but with all the space and nature and friendly neighbors. Walking distance to public transportation but with plenty of space to work from home, this house would be great for anyone looking for more space without sacrificing the benefits of a city. The landlords are long-time local residents, we raised our family nearby and fell in love with this house.

title: It is my distinguished honor to present to you 436 E
description:
It is my distinguished honor to present to you 436 E. Thompson St. available for immediate occupancy. Located in the Heart of Fishtown, along the Delaware River, anchored by Commercial Mixed Use Corridors, including South St, and surrounded by residential properties, this property is situated at the intersection of a quaint & quiet neighborhood. This 3 story new construction townhouse features high end finishes and rooftop space. There is currently an occupant in the building and we are searching for 2 additional roommates. There is a 1 bedroom with a shared bathroom on the 2nd floor renting for $1050/month and a 3rd story bedroom loft with private en suite bathroom renting for $1475/month. All occupants will have access to the rooftop and backyard space and common living area (kitchen, living room, and dining room) The main floor features hardwood floors with high end finishes and lacquer cabinetry & open space that leads into a private backyard space. The property is filled with radiant natural light and illumination from large windows. Walk upstairs to the 2nd floor with 2 bedrooms and a shared bathroom. Continue up the winding staircase to the 3rd story bedroom loft with intricate dimensions and angles allowing for extra ceiling height. The 3rd floor has a loft bedroom and private en suite bathroom. The property is close to bus stops and close to multi-modal public transportation, commercial mixed used corridors with many retail businesses, food establishment, and other entertainment and amenities. To apply, we are running credit reports, criminal backgrounds, eviction history, and reviewing all income & financial documentation. If you are selected as a tenant, we will collect first, last & security deposit(one month). There are no minimum score requirements. The entire financial and credit profile will be reviewed in its entirety to determine application viability. We look forward to doing business with you and we will ensure a smooth, efficient, and professional process for all parties. title: This southwesterly facing corner home with fantastic views
description:
210 Locust St, Philadelphia, PA 19106
Have you been looking for a home or pied a terre in Center City in a location that feels secluded and still offers the conveniences of a city home? West in Society Hill Towers is your answer, This southwesterly facing corner home with fantastic views offers a view of the Center City skyline where you will watch the sun setting, and the north view facing the United States Customs House and the entire historic area of our beautiful Society Hill and Old City. You even have a partial view of the Ben Franklin Bridge. This home features hardwood flooring and decorative wainscoting in the entry foyer which opens to a galley kitchen with floor to ceiling window, and the living room/dining combination with six I.M.Pei designed floor to ceiling corner windows which will make you feel like you are living in your own glass world high in the sky. The kitchen has been totally renovated with pendant lighting, stainless appliances and some glass fronted cabinetry as well as a breakfast bar that seats four. The bedroom has two additional floor to ceiling windows and the renovated full bathroom is located directly outside of the bedroom. The 24 hour door person Society Hill Towers has a beautiful in ground swimming pool and grilling area, a fitness room, underground parking (available at additional fees) and an on site convenient food market as well as being home to the James Beard Award winning Zahav Restaurant. You are steps from the Landmark movie theaters, tons of delicious restaurants, and a block or two from the weekly farmers market in HeadHouse Square.

title: ***Photos are of a similar unit, every unit is unique.***
description:
***Photos are of a similar unit, every unit is unique.*** Welcome to 1217 Spring Garden! This five-story building, the first reinforced concrete structure in the city, began life towards the end of the 19th century as the home of the Bilgram Machine Works and was later converted into this uniquely designed loft-style building featuring 40 units in its entirety. Each unit with its own DNA and original structure! As you enter the building using it’s smart building access controls, you’ll find a lobby designed to both pay homage to the building’s 19th-century industrial past and add some 21st-century gloss. You’ll also take notice of its wheel chair accessibility and new elevator in the former freight elevator shaft. Mail room is also located in the main lobby for convenience. Take a ride up to the 3rd floor where you’ll find unit 304. Walk right into the original industrial DNA design including its original hard wood flooring, loft, and brick exposed walls. You’ll surely take notice of it’s high ceiling and solid structure! As you move along you’ll find a large kitchen with plenty of cabinet storage and all of your essential appliances and your two nicely sized bedrooms. Your master bedroom includes a large closet and master bath! Make sure you stop by the fitness center and bicycle + skateboard storage room located on level B. Enjoy the tour!
1217-35 Spring Garden St #304

The kitchen is also equipped with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and a spacious peninsula, perfect for dining and entertaining. Continue into the airy living room where you will find ample space for lounging on the couch or working at the newly custom built-in desk. The couch easily turns into a queen-size sleeper sofa, ideal for hosting friends or family overnight! Off the living room you will find the bedroom, recently fitted with new windows and stylish, yet practical, plantation shutters. The master closet was recently transformed into the ultimate dream closet! Designed by California Closets, no expense was spared to ensure that you will have more than enough space for your wardrobe. Also, off the living room you will find the bathroom with beautiful stone tile throughout, generous storage space, and a shower/tub completed with bath jets. Here you will also find your very own washer and dryer. Not only is the inside of this unit amazing, but the private covered balcony offering picturesque views of the city provides the perfect combination of indoor-outdoor living. This unit comes fully furnished, with all the furniture being in excellent condition. Also included is complete access to the gym in the building, an outdoor garden with seating, 24/7 security, and access to a covered parking garage with the option to rent a parking space. Located in the historic area of Society Hill, this unit is surrounded by charm and beauty. You also can't beat the convenience of being only steps away from award-winning restaurants, bars, coffee shops, bakeries, and more. Don't miss out on the opportunity to make this penthouse unit in Abbotts Square your next home. Owner is related to the listing agent.

description:

title: UPGRADED TWO BEDROOMS AT EMERSON APARTMENTS
description:
EMERSON APARTMENTS
Thank you for your interest in our apartments.
We are located in the greater northeast section of Philadelphia right off of Bustleton
Avenue with Evarts as the cross street. Our apartments are fully renovated with brand
new kitchens and bathrooms! Parking lot in the rear of the building and laundry facilities on site!
Don’t miss this opportunity to find the home you will love!
Please give us a call or send an email to schedule an appointment for a viewing.
Physical applications are on site.
You may bring along the following so you can apply the same day:
1. The application fee in the form of a money order. The
application fee is $75 for up to two applicants.
*Any adult moving in MUST be on the application.
*Must be 21 years of age or older
2. A copy of your social security card and ID is recommended.
In order to qualify for an apartment, your credit report must have no relevant
landlord tenant filings or evictions. In addition, you cannot have an arrest
record. Your income needs to be at least two - three times the cost of rent.

title: A comfort & secure clean, fully update apartment 1 bed x 1 bath
description:
PA0292, # 1F, 2740 N Ringgold St, Philadelphia, PA 19132
A comfort & secure clean, fully update apartment located*2740 N Ringgold St. The building features courtyard parking, a rooftop (outdoor furniture, grills, green space, and renovations coming soon), and a gym/workout room with state of the art equipment. A new PELOTON bike was just added to the fitness room, and an AMAZON package box was just installed for deliveries. The living room features an oversized window, recessed lighting, and hardwood flooring. The island kitchen has an island space with all-electric appliances a stove, microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher. The units feature in-unit laundry. The bedrooms feature large closets, and hardwood floors. 2740 North Ringgold Street is located in an up-and-coming neighborhood. It is close to schools, childcare facilities, convenience stores, churches, and grocery stores.

Air Conditioner
BBQ/ Picnic Area
Built in stainless steel microwave oven
Ceramic tiled bathrooms
Easy access to shopping
Expansive living space

title: Move right into this absolutely gorgeous, 2 bed, 2.5 bath newly renova
description:
Inspired from the town of Tulum, Vesset Capital Partners brings you a tranquil and trendy renovation. Move right into this absolutely gorgeous, 2 bed, 2.5 bath newly renovated GRADUATE HOSPITAL townhome! This home is light-filled and contemporary with an eye-catching facade, custom wooden slat staircase, hardwood flooring, exposed brick accent walls, and a spacious back patio with in-ground garden beds. A bright open floor plan greets you as you enter the home, and the slatted wood staircase really defines the living room and gives a boho vibe. Heading past the living room you'll find a dining space, half bath with barn door and stylist wall paper and an eat-in kitchen. The kitchen features a breakfast bar, two toned flat panel cabinets, black cabinet pulls and faucet, quartz countertops, marble backsplash, and upgraded stainless steel appliances including a 6-range burner and a smart fridge. The dining room and kitchen feel fresh and airy with south-facing windows and access to the back patio with garden beds and modern privacy fencing. Head to the second floor for 2 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms. The two nicely sized bedrooms feature great closet space and natural and recessed lighting. The primary bedroom is complete with built-in storage next to the ensuite bath and a unique cutout by the window, perfect for plants. Both full bathrooms feature custom floor and shower tiling, a rain shower head in the primary bathroom, vanity storage, and a waterfall sink faucet. The second bedroom features exposed brick and ample windows. Need extra room? title: Spacious and One of the Best Apartment Buildings in Philadelphia!!
description:
The Metropolitan apartments in Center City, Philadelphia stand tall in the center of Philadelphia's historic skyline. Designed by French architect Louis Jallade in the 1920s, this twin-tower apartment building showcases 26 stories of Art Deco elegance and has a prominent history as the former Philadelphia YMCA Armed Forces Building. Before being transformed into the Center City apartment building it is today, The Metropolitan was home to United States servicemen during World War II. Today, The Metropolitan is recognized as one of the best apartment buildings in Philadelphia. You will find a spacious studio, 1-, 2-and 3-bedroom apartment rentals. As well as amenities that include a lounge, gym, basketball court and a rooftop with a gorgeous view of the City Hall and Love Park. The Metropolitan apartments feature original limestone details, terra-cotta tiles, and hand-carved cornices. Fall in love with restored architectural details and contemporary amenities, including renovated kitchens with luxurious personal touches.

title: Penthouse Resident Lounge, Stainless Appliances, Fitness Center
description:
Bedrooms: 1Bathrooms: 1Square Feet: 623Date Available: 2023-03-07Address: 2501 Oakford StAt the seam of Graduate Hospital, Southwest Center City, Point Breeze, and Grays Ferry neighborhoods, Herringbone Lofts creates a new community stitching together old-world charm with modern amenities. Maintaining vintage-factory architecture, the exterior of the building includes generous industrial-style windows, and corten steel paneling. The sleek loft-style interiors feature high ceilings, chef’s kitchens, and sun-drenched open spaces. The various interior layouts present several living options, each providing a clean and timeless canvas ready for your personal touch. The main lobby invites residents and guests into a versatile live-work space containing a coffee bar and lounge, co-working spaces and conference room, and secured mail and package room. The penthouse suite of finely-crafted boutique amenities offers a thoughtfully-designed entertainment space, complete with a residents’ lounge, state-of-the-art fitness center, and a rooftop terrace with panoramic views of Philadelphia. Amenities Include:Rooftop Terrace w/ GrillsWFH stationsFitness CenterPenthouse Resident LoungeCeiling FanHigh CeilingsStorage LoftsOn-Site ManagementIn-Unit Washer/ DryerLobby Coffee BarStainless AppliancesSmartphone-Based Video Access Controlled EntryCall:  show contact info
For more information, visit us at: https://alterrapropertyliving.com/tc45h4kz/herringbone-loftsPricing and availability are subject to change.

title: 2 BR, 2 BATH CONDO IN WOODED COMMUNITY
description:
AVAILABLE FROM MAY 1ST
2 BR, 2 BATH CONDO IN AN EXCELLENT WOODED COMMUNITY
1 SMALL PET WOULD BE CONSIDERED
Renovated in 2022, Grey-White decor. New Flooring & Paint. Upgraded Kitchen, Granite, Stainless, Backspalsh. First Floor. Close to Turnpike & Woods. Nice Community w amenities.
15 minutes from Blue Bell, Close to MERCK, Rt 309, PA Turnpike, Train Station, North Penn High School & Shopping Areas. Easy commute to KOP and Philadelphia thru turnpike. In one of the best School Districts - North Penn
Ceiling fans and recessed ceiling lights; Master Bedroom w/ attached Bathroom & walk in closet;
2 Full baths- 1st with Tub, 2nd with Shower; Patio off of Living Room, with its own access, overlooking swimming pool. Utility Room off Porch. Floor to ceiling closets in LR and BRs. Laundry room, off kitchen, with washer n drier and pantry space. Kitchen with Dishwasher, fridge, Range, microwave and Garbage disposal. Central Heat, Air, Private Entrance, ample Parking.
Lovely Community. This pretty & wooded Condo Community has plenty of amenities Including Walking Trails, Basketball Court, Picnic Area, Swimming Pool, etc.
HOA ($295 per month) and Sewer paid by owner – includes water, garbage, Snow, Landscaping
First, Last, and security deposit required at lease signing. (Can be flexible for the right applicant)

title: Modern 2nd Fl 3 Bed 1 Bath Passyunk Square Apt! W/D! C/A! Balcony!!!!!
description:
Modern 2nd Fl 3 Bedroom, 1 Bath Passyunk Square Apt.! Located in Philadelphia's Hottest Neighborhood...Passyunk Square! Just steps from East Passyunk Avenue! Nice-sized living room with hardwood floors; kitchen has good cabinet and countertop space; closet and appliances include- gas range, refrigerator, and microwave; balcony over looking Jessup St. Beautiful ceramic tile bathroom. 3 nice-sized bedrooms with H/W floors and good closet space. Great apartment! Lots of windows with good natural light! Central Air! Radiator gas heat. W/D in unit. Tenant pays gas, electric, and cable/internet. Landlord pays cold water/sewer. Come see! Cats are ok with a one time non-refundable pet fee. Sorry no dogs. 1st, last and security deposit at lease signing. 1 year lease min. $75 non refundable application fee - with two paystubs/some income verification and photo ID. !

title: Lower Level Studio good light Orig Wood Floors SS Appliances MARCH
description:
MAR Move-In Special!
2205 Spruce Street is a renovated 3 story double wide brownstone apartment building located on a charming residential street in the Rittenhouse Square area of Center City Philadelphia.  This three-story boutique building only has 9 apartments and features a newly landscaped 35' private garden in the rear, a laundry room, and a new elliptical machine and treadmill in the  lower-level exercise room. All amenities are exclusive to 2205 Spruce Street residents. The building faces an architecturally stunning historic church across the street and is conveniently located a few doors down from Cantina Carina, BYO restaurant. This unique vintage building has all of the historic charm of a converted brownstone mansion, coupled with modern conveniences of NEWer apartment kitchens.  NEWer portable AC units provided!
BW is a Studio that with 8' ceilings and great light, and view to the south of the church across the street and north to the skyline from the kitchen. Enjoy restored hardwood floors and a kitchen with NEWer stainless steel appliances, European-styled cabinetry, granite countertops, and slate floor.  This lower level apartment has direct access to the shared back yard and is great for entertaining with large common spaces!
